name: Match MVP Neymar JR - Football
description:
PLAY AGAINST FRIENDS IN FUN MULTIPLAYER FOOTBALL MATCHES! 
Get Neymar JR as your mentor and play to become the best football player in the world!

UNIQUE ONLINE MULTIPLAYER FOOTBALL MATCHES
 Experience full fast paced and fun football matches against millions of other players! 

MY CAREER MODE 
Play as a single character and become a football superstar! Start The Journey and Lead the your team to the biggest trophies! Take your football skills and career to the NEXT LEVEL and Become a Pro!  Do you have what it takes to become the next Neymar Jr?

SWIPE TO PASS! TAP TO SCORE AWESOME GOALS!
 Optimized for your phone controls - no on screen buttons! Master you skills, win the Champions final and score awesome highlight goals!

KEY FEATURES: 

• Play as a single character and become a superstar! 
• Real-time Online multiplayer game! 
• Simple and fun soccer matches vs friends
 • Optimized controls - use gestures not buttons! 
• Fast paced gameplay with tons of action!

-- Download Match MVP Neymar Jr by Like a Boss Games NOW! --

This game needs an internet connection to play
